body:
Hi to everyone!

I'm using HB for Annual Daylight Simulation and I can't find .ill files in the folder. In fact the simulation doesn't run. I have a problem even with the mesh, even if I've used the same geometry for DF simulation. Could you help me, please?

I attach the file too.



Thank you.

replies.body: Hi, I have disconnected some of your settings for my convenience while testing. You should plug them back and the model should work just fine. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/4*70048ZsE5fqDtSTaz9QWBpEyWtSzy1VyBDoJxFO*9Sq9YUaMmKBOJjNWrgf2r8d*a69HBVV2upta5lnOnDMSFDJcbKE1nD/DA.JPG) -Devang

Thank you so much Devang!

I had a problem with Daysim version too, but I really grateful to you!!



Thanks!
